docs.snippet: This institution is situated near the village of Nyack, on the west bank of the Hudson, about 30 miles above New-York. The closing exercises of the Spring term took place on Thursday evening last.

headline.main: Closing Exercises at the Rockland Female Institute.

docs.lead_paragraph: This institution is situated near the village of Nyack, on the west bank of the Hudson, about 30 miles above New-York. The closing exercises of the Spring term took place on Thursday evening last.

docs.snippet: Paymaster CHILTON has been relieved by Major CUNNINGHAM, as Paymaster in the Department of Texas, and ordered to Detroit, Michigan.

headline.main: FROM WASHINGTON.; INTERESTING ARMY AND NAVY NEWS.

docs.lead_paragraph: Paymaster CHILTON has been relieved by Major CUNNINGHAM, as Paymaster in the Department of Texas, and ordered to Detroit, Michigan.

docs.snippet: The steamship Philadelphia has arrived here with Havana dates to the 26th inst.
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Philadelphia has arrived here with Havana dates to the 26th inst.

docs.snippet: Prof. JAMES RENWICK'S idea of a Park for New-York, as developed before the Senatorial Committee on Friday, is a number of roads, thirty feet wide fifteen feet in the centre macadamized with borders of native mud and dust running through a vast extent...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prof. JAMES RENWICK'S idea of a Park for New-York, as developed before the Senatorial Committee on Friday, is a number of roads, thirty feet wide fifteen feet in the centre macadamized with borders of native mud and dust running through a vast extent of swamp and wood, such as the ground now covered by the Central Park was before the year 1857.

docs.snippet: The mammoth vessel actually starts to-day. The last trial trip (the fourth) was on the whole very satisfactory; although nothing like the same speed was made out of her.

headline.main: THE TEMPORAL POWER OF THE POPE.; The Italian Question as it Affects the States of the Church. A SERMON BY ARCHBISHOP HUGHES. He Calls for Material Aid.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Cathedral, in Mott-street was crowded with people yesteday, who were there to listen to a sermon from Archbishop HUGHES, on The Italian Question as it Affects the States of the Church. After the usual preliminary services had been concluded, Archbishop ascended the pulpit, and spoke as follows:

docs.snippet: BOOLE seems to have carried into effect a modification of his roving Sanitary Commission. Not being able to secure a trip to Europe in the beginning of the season in company with "a savant," he has contented himself with a less exciting visit to...
docs.lead_paragraph: BOOLE seems to have carried into effect a modification of his roving Sanitary Commission. Not being able to secure a trip to Europe in the beginning of the season in company with "a savant," he has contented himself with a less exciting visit to Boston; but what he has lost in the length of the tour, he has gained in the number of the tourists.
